snippet: After Dr Pepper and its local bottler parted ways in January, Dublin Bottling Works and a collection of new soda brands were born. One thing hasn’t changed: old-fashioned cane sugar.
lead_paragraph: After Dr Pepper and its local bottler parted ways in January, Dublin Bottling Works and a collection of new soda brands were born. One thing hasn’t changed: old-fashioned cane sugar.

headline.seo: After Parting Ways With Dr Pepper, Dublin Bottler Goes On
headline.main: Going on, Cane Sugar and All, After Dr Pepper
headline.print_headline: Going On, Cane Sugar and All, After Dr Pepper
